messages.content: does the world need automation or manual labour is okay

I think the world needs both automation and manual labour. 
Automation has led to mass unemployment many times in the past but it has also led to productivity gains and higher living standards for people. 
Manual labour is essential for creativity and innovation. Having someone assemble your Iphone as part of a production line is not very creative. A human being putting together your Iphone is.  
So I think both automation and manual labour are needed  for the world to progress
why the world needs a superhero
Because, unlike a super hero, a superhero requires no special powers to do what they do. A superhero is just a person who does what's right, even though it might not always be easy or popular.
